text: Yadi timila'i logne svasnibica vadaâ€“ vivadako bhaya cha, bhane e'uta madhyasthakarta logneko tarphabata ra e'uta madhyastha svasniko khalakabata niyukta gara. Yadi yi duvaile melamilapa gara'una cahanchan bhane allahale duvaima melamilapa kayama gara'idincha. Kunai sandeha chaina ki allaha sarvajnata ra sarvalaukika cha
